title: King Lear [Poster for Public Theater, New York]
description: Upper half of poster has black ground and "KING LEAR" in large, bold gold letters across center of poster.  The bottom half of the poster shows a red-printed photographic image of a close-up of the top of a man's face, focusing on his intense gaze and seering, perhaps wrathful, expression of his eyes.  The letters of the title "King Lear" are like a crown on the man's head.
name: Poster
